item.title: CVE-2024-22277|2024-08-01T22:43:34.111Z -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20cloud%20director%20availability
item.description: VMware Cloud Director Availability contains an HTML injection vulnerability. A malicious actor with network access to VMware Cloud Director Availability can craft malicious HTML tags to execute within replication tasks.
